list.abs: Leonardo在他的一部划时代的钜著《算盘书》（Liber abbaci）中，提供了一段自传，内容如下：我和父亲会合是在他被派任Pisa的海 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from ecclesiastical Latin abbacia, from abbas, abbat- (see abbot)

means.word_mean: 1. the jurisdiction or office of an abbot
